lines: Ndina mponesi anondimirira, Kana ndisina shamwari dzepasi
Anondichengeta, nemutsa ne nyasha, Dano Tenzi vangu varivakowo
Ndinaye Baba, akandipa ini, Tariro yeupenyu iri idi
Achandidaidza kwaari kudenga, O daro arega ndauya newe!
Ndine nguwo yakachena kwazvowo!, Yakarindira kuti ndiyione!
O kuti ndoyigashira ichipenya, Newe ungagashira yako here?
Ndakapiwa runyararo idi, Urwovo shamwari dzenyika dzisina
Muvambi nemupi wacho ndiJesu, Namatira urâ€™ piwezve newevo
Jesu akuwana, udzawo vamwe, Kuti Jesu ndi Muponesi wako
Namata, Jesu avaunze kumbira, Unopindurwa, sezvo ndapindurwa
